channel.title: [1.3.2] justxp ♦♦♦ [clans] [classic] [ecodome] [events] [pvp] ♦♦♦
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yJDze.png[/img]
Forums ~ MCF thread ~ IRC ~ Guides ~ CLANS
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UxMNz.png[/img]
[font=trebuchet ms]JustXP is a simple, classic Survival-PvP server. We have PvP pluJustXP is a simple, classic Survival-PvP server.We have PvP plugins like healing fast soups, and a biodome style spawn with three different teleports to three different locations on the Server map.The Zen brotherhood is the main clan of the server, so if you wish to join and challenge us, feel free to do it!We're looking for mature players aged 12 to 20 (this isn't definite, but it would be preferable), dedicated players and not just play and leave or quitting over lag or death.We usually never lag. [/font]
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kBHKP.png[/img]
- Great places to build your house at, and teleporters leading straight to them (Teleporter A) - 3 different teleports in spawn to 3 different locations in the world.
♦ Health-healing Stews. ♦ 3-day Server Events. ♦ Real PvP. ♦ Hard Surivial. ♦ Dedicated Community. ♦ Dedicated Forum Community. ♦ GroupManager Clans with ClanTags. ♦ Inter-Clan Wars. ♦ Limited Personal House Protections. ♦ Unlimited Clan Base Protections.. ♦ Nice and Well-Built Spawn. ♦ No Plugins Such as McMMO \ Factions\ MobArena; It's Classic! ♦ Active Members of Staff ♦ Active Owners, Also Participating in Survival. ♦ Unlimited Lockette Chest Protections. ♦ And a Lot More!
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pOfwn.png[/img]
[url=http://"http://justxp.plutoh...read.php/?tid=7"]CLICK HERE TO SEE THE TUTORIAL[/url]
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦
[img]http://i.imgur.com/mcec5.png[/img]
Admin - Administrators \ owners ; This rank is not available for anyone.
Moderator - These are helping our server from being spammed \ being full of hackers \ etc basically, they save the game.
Helper - These guys are helping the server with helping out new members & advertising.
Donator - Simple, $5+ donator gets this rank.
Player - To get this rank, you must read the boards at spawn, the board tells you how to get ranked, read the red text. Guest - These are guests, and they can not do anything more than teleporting using the tabportals or running around the world.
♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VVa89.png[/img]
[3\9\12] Jumping course at spawn! 1 winner only. event lasts until someone wins or 6\9\12
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uyeo4.png[/img]
To play JustXP, you will need to login to the following IP address:
[b][size=24pt]46.4.74.213:25574[/size][/b]
At the moment, you must use PORT. We will soon get a paid domain (we do have one but we are having some tech problems with that)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oEn22.png[/img]
Please read these carefully in order to complete the Application for full member correctly.
The server will operate on a Greylist; This means you will be able to log in normally, but need to have applied and gotten accepted by the Server Staff to have permissions to build, destroy, or use commands.
- Griefing of any kind is not allowed. You may break the minimum amount of blocks to enter any un-protected structure (2x1), but anything on a larger scale will get you banned. - Stealing from unlocked chests is allowed, and you will not face any punishment for doing so. - the usage of any form of hacks which give you an unfair advantage over other players will result in you being permanently banned. This includes but is not limited to Aimbots, Flying, and Xray. ~ The only mods allowed on the server are: Mini-Maps (which do not show players), OptiFine, Shaders and Spout. - The usage of hack clients is a bannable offense. - Any form of duping will result in a ban. - Glitching through doors via use of enderpearls or similar is allowed!
Tell your friends, advertise us, vote for us, diamond use. you will be awarded with the [Helper] tag for a limited time.
Current Staff list
Bowdo2527 - Owner Bigbadbrad78 - Owner Duerdum9 - Moderator Purush - Moderator Binnso96\steven - Moderator
Current Clan list (most active -> inactive)
CoA (4 this week) BiF (0 this week) VaT (2 this week) - New! DGC - (0 almost dead this week)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/W6s9r.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/757HY.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UbdbB.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LvMLS.png[/img]
Hope to see you all![/center]

item.title: [1.3.2] justxp ♦♦♦ [clans] [classic] [ecodome] [events] [pvp] ♦♦♦
item.dc:creator: @artemkller artemkller
item.description:
@artemkller wrote:

[center]

Forums ~ MCF thread ~ IRC ~ Guides ~ CLANS

[font=trebuchet ms]JustXP is a simple, classic Survival-PvP server.
We have PvP pluJustXP is a simple, classic Survival-PvP server.We have PvP plugins like healing fast soups, and a biodome style spawn with three different teleports to three different locations on the Server map.The Zen brotherhood is the main clan of the server, so if you wish to join and challenge us, feel free to do it!We’re looking for mature players aged 12 to 20 (this isn’t definite, but it would be preferable), dedicated players and not just play and leave or quitting over lag or death.We usually never lag.
[/font]

  • Great places to build your house at, and teleporters leading straight to them (Teleporter A)
  • 3 different teleports in spawn to 3 different locations in the world.

Health-healing Stews.
3-day Server Events.
Real PvP.
Hard Surivial.
Dedicated Community.
Dedicated Forum Community.
GroupManager Clans with ClanTags.
Inter-Clan Wars.
Limited Personal House Protections.
Unlimited Clan Base Protections…
Nice and Well-Built Spawn.
No Plugins Such as McMMO \ Factions\ MobArena; It’s Classic!
Active Members of Staff
Active Owners, Also Participating in Survival.
Unlimited Lockette Chest Protections.
And a Lot More!

CLICK HERE TO SEE THE TUTORIAL

Admin - Administrators \ owners ; This rank is not available for anyone.

Moderator - These are helping our server from being spammed \ being full of hackers \ etc basically, they save the game.

Helper - These guys are helping the server with helping out new members & advertising.

Donator - Simple, $5+ donator gets this rank.

Player - To get this rank, you must read the boards at spawn, the board tells you how to get ranked, read the red text.
Guest - These are guests, and they can not do anything more than teleporting using the tabportals or running around the world.

[3\9\12] Jumping course at spawn! 1 winner only. event lasts until someone wins or 6\9\12

To play JustXP, you will need to login to the following IP address:

[size=24pt]46.4.74.213:25574[/size]

At the moment, you must use PORT. We will soon get a paid domain (we do have one but we are having some tech problems with that)

Please read these carefully in order to complete the Application for full member correctly.

The server will operate on a Greylist; This means you will be able to log in normally, but need to have applied and gotten accepted by the Server Staff to have permissions to build, destroy, or use commands.

  • Griefing of any kind is not allowed. You may break the minimum amount of blocks to enter any un-protected structure (2x1), but anything on a larger scale will get you banned.
  • Stealing from unlocked chests is allowed, and you will not face any punishment for doing so.
  • the usage of any form of hacks which give you an unfair advantage over other players will result in you being permanently banned. This includes but is not limited to Aimbots, Flying, and Xray.
    ~ The only mods allowed on the server are: Mini-Maps (which do not show players), OptiFine, Shaders and Spout.
  • The usage of hack clients is a bannable offense.
  • Any form of duping will result in a ban.
  • Glitching through doors via use of enderpearls or similar is allowed!

Tell your friends, advertise us, vote for us, diamond use.
you will be awarded with the [Helper] tag for a limited time.

Current Staff list

Bowdo2527 - Owner
Bigbadbrad78 - Owner
Duerdum9 - Moderator
Purush - Moderator
Binnso96\steven - Moderator

Current Clan list (most active -> inactive)

CoA (4 this week)
BiF (0 this week)
VaT (2 this week) - New!
DGC - (0 almost dead this week)

757HY.jpg1445×985

UbdbB.png1510×947

LvMLS.png1563×996

Hope to see you all![/center]
